body.name: Lifestyle Solutions Collection Grayson Micro-Fabric Sofa, Dark Grey
features: Note : To ensure proper assembly, please follow all steps provided in the installation manual (provided in pdf below)

COMFORTABLE SOFA: Our button-tufted rolled-arm Grayson sofa has thick, plush seat cushions for the utmost in comfort and style. It's perfect for lounging and relaxing with the family under a chenille throw

BEAUTIFUL, TUFTED SOFA: This sofa's tufted back and square faux wooden legs add to its timeless profile and classic American comfort. It will be a beautiful and complementary addition to your home or office space

SPECIFICATIONS: Our sofa is made from premium microfabric and has a sturdy wood frame. No tools required to assemble. It's traditional with modern sensibilities. This sofa measures 80.7” W x 32.3” D x 31.1” H

CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Vacuum occasionally, and use the soft brush attachment to remove particles. Spot clean prior to a full clean. Use a dry cloth with soap and water, and apply pressure using circular motions; avoid harsh chemicals to treat
body.description: The Lifestyle Solutions Grayson button-tufted sofa will be the center of your design theme in your living room. Our thoughtfully designed sofa gives charm and bespoke elegance to any design aesthetic and is a sophisticated, comfy seating option for you and your family. With its craftsmanship and attention to detail, you can be assured of the quality and be proud to have the Grayson in your home. This comfy couch with rolled arms is ideal for someone who's just starting out and needs apartment furniture. Whether you live in a studio or a loft, the Grayson will fit right in and add a touch of luxury.The Grayson sofa is easy to assemble, and no tools are required. Simply click it together, and the sofa is ready for stylish comfort and enjoyment. It has a heavy-duty wood frame and offers durable support. There are plenty of couches and sofas out there, but the Grayson fits any living room style: modern, traditional, and contemporary. If you're looking for a mini couch for your basement entertainment room or a small sofa for a home theater, this is the ideal sofa. And if you've dreamed of turning your bedroom into a luxury hotel suite, this bedroom sofa will make your room an oasis of comfort and relaxation. With Lifestyle Solutions, your design dreams are limitless.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Vacuum the seat cushions, backrest, arms, and under the seat cushions regularly., Avoid using strong chemicals to clean your upholstered furniture. Many of these harsh products are not safe for use on upholstery., Wipe Clean with Dry Cloth

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Quality Furniture Lifestyle Solutions prides itself on providing luxuriously comfortable pieces. Whether you need to furnish your apartment or find furniture for your first home, Lifestyle Solutions has quality, fashionable pieces.
Easy Care Taking care of your Lifestyle Solutions piece is easy. Follow the instructions above to ensure the comfort, cleanliness, and overall look of your furniture.

Wooden Frame Design for your family in mind, our pieces are crafted with solid wood, heavy-duty wooden frames, built for durability and longevity. Faux-Wood Legs Our intelligent design allows the legs to stay strong, durable, and easy to clean for a timeless look. High-Density Foam Comfort is our top priority. The foam used in our pieces is thick, high-density, and luxuriously comfortable. Whether you are streaming your favorite shows or taking a quick nap, this foam will keep you wrapped in comfort. We know that spills happen, so we designed our furniture with that in mind. If you spill something on our fabric, no problem! It's easy to clean and will protect against stains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Good Sofa: The Perfect Fusion of Comfort and Style
reviews.reviewText: The microfiber sofa required assembly, and I have to say, I was pleasantly surprised by the overall quality and comfort. Despite the initial hassle of putting it together, the result was worth it. The microfiber material used for this sofa is incredibly soft and feels pleasing to the touch. However, it is prone to attracting lint and pet hair easily. I appreciate that it is easy to clean, as spills and stains are bound to happen in a household with pets.The design of the sofa is sleek and modern, fitting in nicely with my existing decor. It offers ample seating space, perfect for entertaining guests or simply lounging around. The cushions are firm yet comfortable, providing adequate support for extended periods of sitting. I was impressed with the sturdiness of the frame once fully assembled. The instructions were clear and easy to follow, making the assembly process relatively straightforward. While it did take some time and effort to put together, the result was a solid and well-built sofa that I am confident will last for years to come.Overall, despite the initial assembly, this microfiber sofa has exceeded my expectations regarding quality, comfort, and style. I would highly recommend it to anyone needing a functional and attractive seating option for their home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble couch
reviews.reviewText: One of the biggest concerns I have with buying furniture, outside of value for money, is whether it’s easy to put together, if I need extra tools, and so on. Thankfully this couch did not disappoint. Assembly is very easy, and goes along with the directions. There are two pieces I could not put in on the ends, and you will absolutely want to make sure you have someone on hand to help attach the back piece to the seating portion. Otherwise as far as assembly goes, pretty smooth!The couch itself is nice for the price. It’s not Egyptian cotton; you will feel the wood frame on the armrests for example, so a couch pillow is a great idea, but you’ll be just fine sitting down. The size to me is a pretty perfect size as far as a three-person couch is considered. My personal height runs a bit on the short side so I’m able to lay down comfortably when needed.The biggest thing to keep in mind is that this is not a sturdy couch. It’ll have no problem bearing weight according to the weight limit, but the frame itself is not anything like steel. There is the possibility you can break one of the legs if you go to sit down and throw your weight against the couch too hard, as is the case that happened to me with two of the four legs broken but semi-functioning, so you’ll want to exercise caution against strong physical actions like jumping onto it. Same thing with the cushioning, as the cushioning along the back of the seat may tear with enough force.If you’re looking for a very affordable three-seat couch that’s easy to put together, this will work just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What's not to love about this sofa?
reviews.reviewText: I'm not gonna lie. I was worried that this couch would be difficult to put together. But honestly it was amazingly easy to assemble, but does require an extra hand or two to help with assembly. Also the box is ackward and bulky. Make sure you have someone to help you get it into your place. The fabric is velvety soft, simple yet stylish. I added 2 pillows & a throw blanket to give it a little more flare. Only negative I can say is the cushions are a bit firm. But honestly not bad at all! I want to buy the matching chair down the line. This was a great buy for me considering I took a chance & bought one of "blemished" or "damaged" sofa's for $197, when they are usually mid-upper $200's. Well worth, with no damage to the couch at all, just the box! What a bargain piece!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn't even last a year
reviews.reviewText: The tops of the back cushions ripped away from the back frame. Lasted about 8 months maybe. Cushions are non removable. Also small for adults, barely enough room for a single person to lay down. Too small for couch pillows, even the small ones are too big. Arms have no cushion. Fibers stay to come through it leaving it looking like it has hair on it. Back cushions also begin to sag and bunch up. Have to take it apart if you drop phone down the sides because it gets trapped inside the couch at the bottom and you hand doesn't fit in the gap. Would not recommend. Not even a year later already need to replace it .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the price but delivery was a nightmare
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great couch for the price, cushions are a little firm but I like it that way. It was fairly easy to assemble, did it by myself in about 20 minutes. The “scheduled” delivery, however, was an absolute nightmare. Not once did anyone reach out to me to schedule a delivery date but one was provided to me through the tracking information which happened to work with my schedule. Unfortunately, while I was out of town for a few days long before the “scheduled” delivery date, the company attempted to deliver my couch three days in a row after telling them I was not home to accept the delivery and that is not the day that it was supposed to be delivered. The owner of the delivery company even pressured me to try to get someone else to come sign for the couch for me, even though it was about four days before the supposedly scheduled delivery date. Also, I’m not sure if it’s an issue with the clearly unprofessional delivery company or if it’s an issue with the warehouse that it came from, but the couch arrived dirty and damaged in one corner. I would not recommend purchasing this, especially if you live in a rural area. The couch came in a box that was not difficult to bring inside on my own so I don’t see any reason why this couldn’t have been shipped through UPS or Amazon itself. While I am satisfied with the couch itself, because I purchased a couch cover to hide the damage, the entire process was such a headache that it was absolutely not worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Difficult to get furniture in my basement. Thought if I have to put it together it would fit. For the price I thought it won't be much. I am so pleased. I love it and fits perfect and looks great. It is really firm but feels well built. I wouldn't let kids jump around on it and it should hold up for a few years anyways.
